import android.os.Bundle
import android.view.View
import android.widget.Button
import android.widget.EditText
import android.widget.ImageView
import android.widget.Toast
import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
import com.bumptech.glide.Glide
import com.example.ntcanteen.R
import java.io.File
import java.io.IOException
import java.util.UUID
import kotlin.random.Random

class MainActivity : AppCompatActivity() {
    private lateinit var imageView: ImageView
    private lateinit var editText: EditText
    private lateinit var button: Button

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_main)

        imageView = findViewById(R.id.imageView)
        editText = findViewById(R.id.editText)
        button = findViewById(R.id.button)

        button.setOnClickListener {
            uploadPhoto()
        }
    }

    private fun uploadPhoto() {
        val photoFile = File(getExternalFilesDir(null), UUID.randomUUID().toString() + ".jpg")
        try {
            val bitmap = BitmapFactory.decodeStream(contentResolver.openInputStream(MediaStore.Images.Media.EXTERNAL_CONTENT_URI))
            val outputStream = FileOutputStream(photoFile)
            bitmap.compress(Bitmap.CompressFormat.JPEG, 100, outputStream)
            outputStream.close()
            Glide.with(this).load(photoFile).into(imageView)
            Toast.makeText(this, "图片上传成功", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        } catch (e: IOException) {
            Toast.makeText(this, "图片上传失败", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
        }
    }
}

import android.os.Bundle

class Menu : AppCompatActivity() {
    private lateinit var imageView: ImageView
    private lateinit var editText: EditText
    private lateinit var button: Button

    override fun onCreate(savedInstanceState: Bundle?) {
        super.onCreate(savedInstanceState)
        setContentView(R.layout.activity_menu)

        imageView = findViewById(R.id.imageView)
        editText = findViewById(R.id.editText)
        button = findViewById(R.id.button)

        button.setOnClickListener {
            editMenu()
        }
    }

    private fun editMenu() {
        val price = editText.text.toString().toDouble()
        val comment = "${price}元"
        Toast.makeText(this, "菜品价格设置为:${comment}", Toast.LENGTH_SHORT).show()
    }
}
